intro: Epidendrum dalstromii, commonly known as the Dalstrom's Epidendrum, is a tropical orchid native to Central and South America. It is characterized by its compact, evergreen growth habit and produces clusters of fragrant, white to pale yellow flowers. The plant typically grows on trees or rocks, thriving in humid, shaded environments. Its leaves are elliptical,革质 (leathery), and arranged in a rosette pattern. Epidendrum dalstromii is appreciated for its ornamental value and is relatively easy to cultivate under the right conditions.
